title: Homemade spicy sausages
ingredients: ['1.35m large sausage casing, about 5 to 7.5cm wide', '1.8kg lean pork meat', '900g pork fat', '4 tablespoons finely chopped garlic', '2 tablespoons salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1/4 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 tablespoon ground paprika', '1/4 teaspoon crushed bay leaf', '1/4 teaspoon dried sage', '5 teaspoons hickory-flavoured liquid smoke']
